title: I need help setting up my new Pixel 4a 5G
content: My new Pixel 4a 5G arrived today. At the end of the set up process it would not download any of the apps. Just constantly says "download pending". I did a factory reset and tried a second time through the whole set up process and am having the same problem.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
